snippet: Enrique Peña Nieto of the Institutional Revolutionary Party holds a commanding lead over his nearest rival four months ahead of presidential elections, a poll showed on Monday.
abstract: Enrique Pena Nieto of the Institutional Revolutionary Party holds a commanding lead over his nearest rival four months ahead of Mexico's presidential elections.
lead_paragraph: Enrique Peña Nieto of the Institutional Revolutionary Party holds a commanding lead over his nearest rival four months ahead of presidential elections, a poll showed on Monday.
